section.name: Credits
section.p: EJBCA uses the opensource JCE crypto provider from The Legion of the Bouncy Castle.
Development and default deployment is done using the J2EE application server JBoss AS.

This product includes software developed by The Apache Software Foundation (http://www.apache.org/).
Ant
commons-collections
commons-fileupload
commons-lang
Tomcat and Jasper
Xerces
log4j
Batik
...
OpenLDAP is used to support LDAP directories.

Other softwares include:
XDoclet
JUnit
HttpUnit
Complete descriptions and licenses can be found in the 'doc'-directory in the EJBCA download package.
